summary: An interstellar hero from a distant world visits Earth, and tries to fit in with a mundane, yet kind, suburban family.
cast: Hulk Hogan|Christopher Lloyd|Shelley Duvall|Larry Miller|William Ball|Jo Ann Dearing|Jack Elam|Roy Dotrice|Tony Longo|Michael Faustino|Mark Calaway|Laura Mooney|Dennis Burkley|Luis Contreras|Nick Eldredge|Vincent Hammond|Denice Kumagai|Richard Narita|Tony Epper|Christopher Neame|John Furlong|Marcy Goldman|Jennifer Delora|Ellis Edwards|Keith Campbell|Michael Ballew|David Efron|Marc Miles|Will Miles|Elisabeth Moss|Malachi Pearson|Joey Simmrin|Skip Stellrecht|Sumant|Tom Morga|Louan Gideon|Sparkle|Billy 'Sly' Williams|Duane Taniguchi|Pat Millicano|Nicolas Read|Frank Welker
title: Suburban Commando
